DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Cataract Pupillary Dilation : Inpatient At The Ambulatory Surgery Center v Outpatient Dilation Prior To Arrival At The Ambulatory Surgery Center
DOC.criteria: Ability self administer eye helper task administer eye drop . Ability follow eye drop administration schedule . No noted ocular abnormality . Bilateral cataract surgery anticipate . Inability self administer eye drop assistance eye drop administration . Health problem would contraindicate self administration dilate eye drop poor cardiovascular respiratory status .
